Posts.Content: My results were benign, but have to have follow up 6 months watch for changes, so January have another biopsy, if see notice any changes I have to go back ASAP. So now more waiting, I'm so happy for you both, just hope we all continuer to get the best results posable ((( hugs )))

Posts.Content: I go see my Dr next week so will find out then why, I'm sure that's what she said, but will ask once I see my Dr she'll know what's going on. Now we can relax for the rest of the year. ((( hugs ))))
Posts.Title: Lump and dense breasts 1 2

Posts.Content: Hi I'm 61 have found a small lump in my breast because I have dense breast makes it hard to feel for lumps, I also have a tender stop behind my nipple, I see my Dr tomorrow going to ask for a mammogram . Because I have dense breast is it better if I ask for other tests? I'm unsure what tests I should be asking for, I'm really worried that I have breast cancer. Hope someone can help with the tests I need to ask for.
Posts.Title: Lump and dense breasts 1 2

Posts.Content: I seen Dr she felt a lump in my right breast and under my arm, I'm booked in for altersound, mammogram and biopsy, Next week not sure when I'll get answers, The waiting is painful.
Posts.Title: Lump and dense breasts 1 2

Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by babygirl127 Yes I am 48 and have dense breasts and they say my mammograms are hard to read. I do get ultrasounds as well. I do not know when they order MRI? I know they cost more. They recently found something abnormal on my left breast, I can feel it too. Mammo and Ultrasound left them clueless so now I too go for biopsy. next week Good thing you only have to wait 1 week, I go next week and my wait time is 4 weeks. Yes the waiting is HORRIBLE! Just want it over with with answers. I pray it is benign for you and me. HUGS to you. Please post next week. Wishing you good luck, I'm sorry you have to wait so long. I'm lucky here in Australia mamagrams are free, as are the other scans and biopsy. I too am praying our results are benign Hugs for you too as I know can use one now

Posts.Content: My choose for a double mastectomy, I'm so sick of the constant worry not only for me but my family, my sister also is going to have surgery
